column1:
T
he Petitioner by this Application is seeking a Writ of Mandamus to get compensation
for  the  due  amount  of  his  salary  subsequent  to  the  conviction  and  sentencing  and
furthermore  for  him  to  be  reinstated  as  the  Chairman  of  the  Provincial  Council.
However, the Petitioner has failed to demonstrate any material to establish that he has
sought these reliefs from the relevant authority and the said request has been refused
before invoking the jurisdiction of the Court of Appeal.
